about_the_game:
Welcome to the Super Retro World - Character Pack which features everything creators need to setup their heroic party for their next great RPG. This pack contains characters with walk and attack animations, you will find many heroes and monsters to bring life to your game!

Pick up the Super Retro World - Character Pack today to have all the right pieces for building a retro inspired world !

Features:

* 32 animated hero characters : walking + Action-RPG attack animation (4 swords, 2 spears, 6 staffs and 5 shields) in 4 directions
* 37 animated monsters characters : walking in 4 directions (slime, skeleton, zombie, ghost, djinn, scorpion, minotaur)
* 6 animated monsters characters : walking front direction (snake girl, mushroom, succubus, mage, worm, bumblebee. Characters contain color variations)
* A small tutorial to setup basic Action-RPG attack animation on maps.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
